system.requirements:
Tier 3; Inspire Wrath
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Leadership
system.effect: When the character uses Charm or Intimidate Skills to affect more than one person, they can affect 100x their Fellowship Bonus people, instead of just 10x Fellowship Bonus.

description.value: When the character uses Charm or Intimidate Skills to affect more than one person, they can affect 100x their Fellowship Bonus people, instead of just 10x Fellowship Bonus.
